body: If i reset consumer offset of RMQ_SYS_TRANS_HALF_TOPIC,skip the message,the exception disappears.

when i get message in rocketmq-console,i get exception information:

> Caused by: java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException: null
        at sun.reflect.GeneratedMethodAccessor333.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:498)
        at org.joor.Reflect.on(Reflect.java:694)
        ... 88 common frames omitted
Caused by: org.apache.rocketmq.client.exception.MQClientException: CODE: 208  DESC: query message by key finished, but no message.
For more information, please visit the url, http://rocketmq.apache.org/docs/faq/
        at org.apache.rocketmq.client.impl.MQAdminImpl.queryMessage(MQAdminImpl.java:409)
        ... 92 common frames omitted
LGTM：）
可以通过DefaultMQAdminExt#setClientCallbackExecutorThreads，把Netty的网络线程数量限制一下，默认情况下会开启 n  * DefaultMQAdminExt  *  cpucores 个网络线程！

And,you must put forword a issue firstly. @yongliangcode

LGTM

The released 4.x.x versions are not support role change automatically.
But it will be supported soon, the branch "develop" is already supported by using dledger.
Quick start of deldger: https://github.com/apache/rocketmq/blob/develop/docs/cn/dledger/quick_start.md
In this situation, you can use mqadmin command "updateBrokerConfig" to update the  brokerIP2 property.

I set vm.min_free_kbytes = 1000000 and resolved the problem. 

> you can try to execute os.sh and setcache.sh and open the transientStorePoolEnable config in the broker to polish this situation.
